sentences.sContent: ...the introduction of legislation to compel cyclists to wear a helmet.
sentences.sCn: …强制骑车人戴头盔的法律的引入。

sentences.sContent: ...Recent reports found that lodging with a student of a different race may decrease prejudice and compel students to engage in more ethnically diverse friendships...

remMethod.val: com ＋ pel (驱使) → 驱使去做 → 强迫， 迫使

words.tran: 引人注目的；强制的；激发兴趣的
强迫；以强力获得（compel的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to force someone to do something
